resources.string: Are you sure you want to do this?
The first computer was built in 1822.T
The company Oracle invented the Java programming language.F
Python functions can return multiple values.T
JavaScript\'s design was influenced by 9 different languages such as Java, Lua, and Python.T
Like Ruby and JavaScript, C programming language is interpreter-based.F
Java is the second most popular programming language after C.T
Python\'s creator, Guido van Rossum, wrote the poem "The Zen of Python" to detail Python\'s philosophies.F
The output of the Javascript code, console.log("red" + 2 + 3), is "red5".F
C is considered a low-level programming language.T
